data.title: 以 1 到 3 分钟谈论以下主题
data.content: Name a person in your life who inspires you. What is your favorite memory with this person? What can you learn from his or her life that you can apply to your own?
data.answer: The person who inspires me a lot is my grandfather. To me, he is a hero, an ideal father, a benevolent person and a man of his honour. He is around 75 years old now. We live in a joint family and he is still the head of our family. Though he can't manage every aspect of our family due to his age, yet he is still the decision maker for our family, and each single decision he has ever made involves a great level of kindness towards every other person. I remember him from my early childhood when he used to play chess with me. He taught me many things including the value of kindness. He told me some of his great adventures in his life through stories and those stories are still inspiring for me. He has a great number of virtues that I can learn from him. He is a person of his word. He would not talk much but when he does it carries unparallel weights. He is a benevolent person as I have seen him helping many people in our locality. I like him so much that I want to become a person like him. (200字)
